name: Floppy Moose
description:
NOTICE!!! Itch.io and Unity are not playing well together please full screen the game to get the full game. 

Jason Weinmann made a new video I learned things and improved on it for this!  This is a lot like flappy birds you just keep jumping to get that high score only two caveats. One: It ramps up in difficulty and Two: You CAN actually win just cross the finish line. :) Hope you enjoy!

Press Space to jump 
Press Escape to exit

Also if you figure out how to win please don't share ;)
